excerpt: For a limited time, you can purchase the Kodak 10″ Digital Picture Frame with Wi-Fi and Multi-Touch Display (Matte White) for only $69.95, saving you $80.
text: For a limited time, you can purchase the Kodak 10″ Digital Picture Frame with Wi-Fi and Multi-Touch Display (Matte White) for only $69.95, saving you $80. This would make a very creative Christmas present. Preload it with photos of your special someone, and voila.Features include;10″ IPS Touchscreen1280 x 800 Screen Resolution16GB of Internal Memory StorageWi-FiSDHC Card Slot (up to 32GB)USB PortIntegrated SpeakersSupports Photos, Videos, and AudioCreate Slideshows with MusicPurchase the Kodak 10″ Digital Picture Frame with Wi-Fi and Multi-Touch Display (Matte White) for only $69.95The matte white Kodak 10″ Digital Picture Frame has a 10″ IPS touchscreen with a resolution of 1280 x 800 and a 16:10 aspect ratio. Content from your personal computer or flash drive can be stored on the 16GB of internal memory via its USB port, or use the integrated SDHC slot, which supports cards up to 32GB. Content can also be uploaded to the frame from cloud sources, or your phone using the Kodak Photo Frame app and Wi-Fi. If you'd like to make things more lively, integrated speakers allow background music to be added to slideshows, which can be configured to play in various display and transition modes. html:
For a limited time, you can purchase the Kodak 10″ Digital Picture Frame with Wi-Fi and Multi-Touch Display (Matte White) for only $69.95, saving you $80. This would make a very creative Christmas present. Preload it with photos of your special someone, and voila.

Features include;

  • 10″ IPS Touchscreen
  • 1280 x 800 Screen Resolution
  • 16GB of Internal Memory Storage
  • Wi-Fi
  • SDHC Card Slot (up to 32GB)
  • USB Port
  • Integrated Speakers
  • Supports Photos, Videos, and Audio
  • Create Slideshows with Music

Purchase the Kodak 10″ Digital Picture Frame with Wi-Fi and Multi-Touch Display (Matte White) for only $69.95

The matte white Kodak 10″ Digital Picture Frame has a 10″ IPS touchscreen with a resolution of 1280 x 800 and a 16:10 aspect ratio. Content from your personal computer or flash drive can be stored on the 16GB of internal memory via its USB port, or use the integrated SDHC slot, which supports cards up to 32GB. Content can also be uploaded to the frame from cloud sources, or your phone using the Kodak Photo Frame app and Wi-Fi. If you'd like to make things more lively, integrated speakers allow background music to be added to slideshows, which can be configured to play in various display and transition modes.

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
